item.description:
The 3rd Annual Worcester VegFest is on April 15, 2012 at Worcester Technical High School.

LOCATION: WTHS - 1 Skyline Drive, Worcester, MA (Map: http://mapq.st/yj2Q7B)

FEATURES:
Free admittance! New Venue! Complimentary Vegan Food & Product Samples! Top National Speakers & Authors! Book Signings! Vegan Food! Family Friendly! Raffles! Demos! Entertainment! Loads of Exhibitors! Free Parking! and much more...

PRESENTERS:
* KATHY FRESTON, author "The Lean", "Veganist", "Quantum Wellness". Frequent TV Guest on shows such as Oprah, Ellen, Good Morning America
* T. COLIN CAMPBELL, author of The China Study & focus of the film Forks Over Knives.
* NATHAN RUNKLE, founder and executive director of Mercy for Animals.
* JASMIN SINGER and MARIANN SULLIVAN, of Our Hen House.  

PRESENTATION SCHEDULE:
The exhibitor area will be open from 11am to 5pm. There are lots of free samples, but bring your wallet too because you’ll definitely want to buy an entire plate of lunch, pick up a shirt, or get signed copies of our presenters’ books!

11:00am – VegFest starts
11:00am-12:00pm – Check out exhibitors or catch a performance by Worcester Roller Derby
12:00pm-12:45pm – Presentation: Jasmin Singer & Mariann Sullivan
1:00pm-1:45pm – Presentation: T. Colin Campbell
1:45pm-2:15pm – Book Signing: T. Colin Campbell
2:15pm-3:00pm – Presentation: Kathy Freston
3:00pm-3:30pm – Book Signing: Kathy Freston
3:30pm-4:15pm – Presentation: Nathan Runkle
5:00pm – Event ends

SPONSORS:
Worcester Magazine
Community Health Group
Mercy For Animals
Loving Hut
Spirit of Change Magazine
MA Animal Rights Coalition (MARC)
Wegmans
Autonomie Project
Cedar Foods
Mary's Gone Crackers

PARTICIPATION:
Our exhibitor deadline has passed for the 2012 event. For more
SPREAD THE WORD! Invite your friends! Share the Event Link! 
FOR MORE INFO about donating or volunteering:
Website: http://www.WorcesterVegFest.com/
Email: info@vegworcester.com

FACEBOOK INVITE: http://www.facebook.com/events/320610211313...
item.how_to_find_us: 1 Skyline Drive, Worcester, MA (Map: http://mapq.st/yj2Q7B) Free Parking.
item.name: Worcester VegFest 2012
